2020-12-16.title: Bitcoin Hits New Record Above $20,000, Twitter Up 5% As Stocks Rise On Stimulus Momentum
2020-12-16.describe: Though companies continue to paint a grim near-term outlook, stocks are riding high on expected stimulus.
2020-12-16.content: As economic data continues to point to a stalling recovery, U.S. stocksand the world's first cryptocurrencyare once again hitting record highs on Wednesday in anticipation of another round of fiscal … [+3958 chars]
